long_desc.thetext:
Feature request.
Is it possible to create a textarea which can grow dynamically, when the text height is greater than the actual height of the textarea.
Example: Textarea with height of 20px (1 row). When the user types in a message which is longer than one row (linebreak), the height of the textarea should grow. Until maxheight is reached. If the text still cannot fit into the textarea, a scrollbar should appear.
-> Need a textarea similar to the status update field in facebook.

Adrian, please have a look at this one after you fixed all your defects for the upcoming releases. I thing we should add a property to the TextArea widget which enabled this behavior, but not by default. It would be nice if you share your plan how to get it done with me before you start the implementation.
Here are some links that might get you started: http://james.padolsey.com/javascript/jquery-plugin-autoresize/ http://stackoverflow.com/questions/454202/creating-a-textarea-with-auto-resize
